category.name: Administration.Access Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ADA_Custom_Security_Mapping
preference.preference_description:
Defines the information needed to administer security grouping. Security groups are defined for custom ADA license objects and include a specific workspaceobject classification property and a user object clearance property. Each grouping also contains the administrator and classifier privileges for that security grouping. Valid values are in the format "<Classification>:<Clearance>:<License>:<ADMIN_privilege>:<CLASSIFIER_privilege>", where * <Classification> is to be replaced by the custom classification property name * <Clearance> is to be replaced by the custom clearance property name * <License> is to be replaced by the custom license type name * <ADMIN_privilege> is the admin privilege name for this security grouping. With this privilege set, the user is granted the ability to: Set or modify custom classification on workspace object Create/Modify/Delete custom license Attach custom license to a workspace object Detach custom license from workspace object Delete custom license * <CLASSIFIER_privilege> is the classifier privilege name for this security grouping. With this privilege set, the user is granted the ability to: Set or modify custom classification on a WorkspaceObject object
An example would be: EAR_class:EAR_clear:EAR_license:EAR_ADMIN:EAR_Classifier
